Krenaht:
Are you curious about the Giant Pursuers Talisman? The Giant Pursuers Talisman is given to those who help the work of the Giant Pursuers. But it's not easy to make, and that means we can't just hand them out at will.
If you would collect the ingredients necessary to make the Giant Pursuers Talisman, I can use those ingredients to make the Talisman.
I can also help you to improve the performance of the Giant Pursuers Talisman.
